channel.title: Changing teleport
channel.description:
I need help badly.
I have a portal room, which is one single teleport leading to the portal room.
I was wondering how I can change that teleport to become a minigame teleport, so you can select like Bandos and stuff but not only the minigame on normal magics but on lunar and ancient. It's Ardougne teleport I wanna change If anyone could help me that would be amazing.
Regards, James
